*div1 type="summary"* *p*Governor José Maria Viesca to legislature, September 12, 1828. Pointing out defects in the militia law and suggesting amendments. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="09-10-1828">September 10, 1828.*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Messages suggesting changes in Decree No. 58, militia regulations. Among other things he calls to the attention of the legislature the point raised by Austin, that the law declares that only native-born citizens are eligible to office.]*/p*
